price: 166. Waana innaga (malaa'igta ah) kuwa xurmo weyneeya oo hufa (Alle)21.
footnotes: 21. Iyagoo beeninaya waxay gaalada ka sheegaan Alle inuu leeyahay wiil ama gabdho ama shariigyo.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
